courseDetails.title: The Fundamentals of Prior Authorization
courseDetails.shortDescription: How to successfully obtain prior authorizations
targetAudiences: This course is for people who are interested in field of becoming a prior authorization specialist, or works in the healthcare that requires the knowledge of obtaining prior authorizations.

Also, this course give the opportunity to those who can not afford to take the training course to be a certified prior authorization specialist which cost $900.00 by the ACMA. I paid $1000 for my certification and I want to share my knowledge along with my experience in healthcare with those who want to get their foot in the door.
